attributes.action: Introduce compulsory licenses for all pets: to prevent impulse buying, and fund Pet Welfare Inspections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present, many - perhaps most - pets are neglected or kept in unsatisfactory conditions.

Many pets can be bought very cheaply, and people will buy them on impulse with little or no understanding of how to care for their new pet, resulting in unintentional animal abuse.

A system of licensing would provide funds for Pet Welfare Inspectors to make 
regular checks on the physical and mental health of the animals, and to inspect their living-quarters; it would also a significant cost to buying a pet, and create a "cooling-off" period for potential pet owners.
